From the master of terror comes a new breed of evil!

Since his parents had been killed by vampires in front of his eyes, 
Jack Crow lives for revenge. As a grown-up, he is a fanatic vampire-
hunter who works with a good team in a professional manner. One night, 
after the successful deletion of a nest, the master vampire Valek 
successfully deletes his team and the party hookers. 
As Valek knew Jack&#039;s name, Jack knows that the vampires are up to 
something big. Together with his only living colleague Tony Montoya, 
Katrina, a hooker who will turn into a vampire soon, and newly 
assigned unexperienced greenhorn priest Father Adam Guiteau he 
sets out to find the black cross first. If they fail, vampires 
can walk in the sun from then on.
